nodes.text: Kimaru was a Nightsister, who lived on the planet Dathomir during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

At some point, Kimaru was imprisoned inside the Chamber of Banishment on Dathomir, where her life essence was trapped inside a large crystal. Sometime following 0 BBY, a group of spacers entered the chamber, causing Kimaru to be freed from her crystal. She then proceeded to attack them, but was eventually killed.
